name: q5xjs
description: A small and fast alternative (experimental) implementation of p5.js

scripts.build: find src/ -name '*.js' -exec sh -c 'terser "$1" -o dist/"$(basename "$1" .js).min.js" --compress --mangle' _ {} \;; cp dist/q5.min.js docs/js/q5.min.js; cp README.md docs/README.md; node generate-docs.js
